newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Moody's rates APP Global Finance $638 mln FRN B3.
newsitem.headline: Moody's rates APP Global Finance $638 mln FRN B3.

text.p: Moody's Investors Service said on Thursday it had assigned a B3 rating to the US$638 million secured floating rate notes of APP Global Finance III Cayman Ltd.
The APP Global Finance III notes are secured by a pledge of shares in APP Finance Mauritius that can be exchanged into preferred shares of Asia Pulp and Paper Co Ltd.
The rating agency said in a statement that Asia Pulp & Pape, through its subsidiaries, is currently engaged in an aggressive, debt-financed expansion strategy.
It said a successful execution of the programme would create a formidable of pulp and paper group with substantial market share in Asia and exceptionally low cost porducts.

However, APP's aggressive financial posture carried significant risk over the intermediate term, principally the simultaneous expansion in Malaysia and China which would carry construction as well as political risk, Moody's said.

In addition, it said the company's ability to attract debt maturities over the next three years would be an important determinant of the success of the strategy, and maintenance of the group's ratings.
